accept.description: Accepted file type, consistent with the native attribute
accept.description_zh: 接受的文件类型，与本机属性一致

capture.description: Get the file, the same as the native property
capture.description_zh: 获取与本机属性相同的文件

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24, not in simple mode
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false 和 0-24 级别，不在简单模式下

maxsize.description: Maximum file size, the unit is byte
maxsize.description_zh: 最大文件大小，单位为字节

hide-list.description: Whether to hide the file list

resolve-type.description: The file preprocessing type, can be set to default file data-url (default, the image type contains dataURL and File object, other types contain only File object. file, which contains only File object. data-url, all file types contain dataURL and File object)
resolve-type.description_zh: 文件预处理类型，可以设置为默认文件 data-url（默认，图像类型包含 dataURL 和 File 对象，其他类型只包含 File 对象。 file，只包含 File 对象。 data-url，所有文件类型都包含 dataURL 和 File 对象）

validate-trigger.description: Timing to trigger validation. The optional value is onChange onRemove
validate-trigger.description_zh: 触发验证的时间。可选值为 onChange onRemove

rules.description: The validation rules, return true to indicate that the validation passed. The remaining values are converted to text as user prompts
rules.description_zh: 验证规则返回 true 以指示验证通过。其余值将转换为用户提示时的文本

events.name: before-filter
events.description: Triggered before the event before-read to filter the file list
events.description_zh: 在事件之前触发 before-read 以筛选文件列表

events.name: before-read
events.description: Triggered returns a false value before a file is read to prevent the file from being read(support promise)
events.description_zh: Triggered 在读取文件之前返回一个 false 值，以防止文件被读取（支持 promise）

events.name: after-read
events.description: Triggered after the file is read

events.name: oversize
events.description: Triggered when the file size limit is exceeded
events.description_zh: 超出文件大小限制时触发

events.name: before-remove
events.description: Triggered before file deletion, return false value to prevent file deletion (support promise)
events.description_zh: 在文件删除前触发，返回 false 值以防止文件删除（支持承诺）

events.name: remove
events.description: Triggered when deleting a file. There is a true value to prevent deleting a file (support promise)
events.description_zh: 删除文件时触发。有一个 true 值可以防止删除文件（支持承诺）

events.name: preview
events.description: Triggered when a file is previewed

events.name: click-action
events.description: Intercept click behavior of upload button
events.description_zh: 拦截上传按钮的点击行为

methods.name: chooseFile
methods.description: Trigger the file selection action and display the file list
methods.description_zh: 触发文件选择操作并显示文件列表

methods.name: closePreview
methods.description_zh: 关闭预览文件弹出窗口

methods.name: getLoading
methods.description: Gets a collection of files for state is loading
methods.description_zh: 获取状态正在加载的文件集合

methods.name: getSuccess
methods.description: Gets a collection of files for state is success
methods.description_zh: 获取状态为成功的文件集合

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Gets a collection of files for state is error
methods.description_zh: 获取状态为 error 的文件集合

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear the value of the binding(set to [])and validate messages
methods.description_zh: 清除 binding（set to []） 的值并验证消息
